OPTION.NAME: help
OPTION.INFO: Display help message

OPTION.NAME: allPages
OPTION.INFO: Output all pages

OPTION.NAME: from
OPTION.INFO: Select input data from

OPTION.NAME: outfile
OPTION.INFO: Output file name (use "-" for standard output)

OPTION.NAME: page
OPTION.INFO: Select the page to engrave

OPTION.NAME: resources
OPTION.INFO: Path to SVG resources

OPTION.NAME: scale
OPTION.INFO: Scale percent

OPTION.NAME: minLastJustification
OPTION.INFO: Minimum length of last system which can be stretched to 100% width of page.

OPTION.NAME: to
OPTION.INFO: Select output data format

OPTION.NAME: version
OPTION.INFO: Display the version number

OPTION.NAME: xmlIdSeed
OPTION.INFO: See the random number generator for XML IDs

OPTION.NAME: adjustPageHeight
OPTION.INFO: Crop the page height to the height of the content

OPTION.NAME: breaks
OPTION.INFO: Define page and system breaks layout

OPTION.NAME: evenNoteSpacing
OPTION.INFO: Specify the linear spacing factor

OPTION.NAME: humType
OPTION.INFO: Include type attributes when importing from Humdrum

OPTION.NAME: landscape
OPTION.INFO: The landscape paper orientation flag

OPTION.NAME: mensuralToMeasure
OPTION.INFO: Convert mensural sections to measure-based MEI

OPTION.NAME: mmOutput
OPTION.INFO: Specify that the output in the SVG is given in mm (default is px)

OPTION.NAME: footer
OPTION.INFO: Do not add any footer, add a footer, use automatic footer

OPTION.NAME: header
OPTION.INFO: Do not add any header, add a header, use automatic header

OPTION.NAME: noJustification
OPTION.INFO: Do not justify the system

OPTION.NAME: pageHeight
OPTION.INFO: The page height

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginBottom
OPTION.INFO: The page bottom margin

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginLeft
OPTION.INFO: The page left margin

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginRight
OPTION.INFO: The page right margin

OPTION.NAME: pageMarginTop
OPTION.INFO: The page top margin

OPTION.NAME: pageWidth
OPTION.INFO: The page width

OPTION.NAME: unit
OPTION.INFO: The MEI unit (1/2 of the distance between the staff lines)

OPTION.NAME: barLineWidth
OPTION.INFO: The width of a barline in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: beamMaxSlope
OPTION.INFO: The maximum beam slope

OPTION.NAME: beamMinSlope
OPTION.INFO: The minimum beam slope

OPTION.NAME: font
OPTION.INFO: Set the music font

OPTION.NAME: graceFactor
OPTION.INFO: The grace size ratio numerator

OPTION.NAME: graceRhythmAlign
OPTION.INFO: Align grace notes rhythmically with all staves

OPTION.NAME: graceRightAlign
OPTION.INFO: Align the right position of a grace group with all staves

OPTION.NAME: hairpinSize
OPTION.INFO: The haripin size in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: lyricSize
OPTION.INFO: The lyrics size in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: lyricTopMinMargin
OPTION.INFO: The minmal margin above the lyrics in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: minMeasureWidth
OPTION.INFO: The minimal measure width in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: measureNumber
OPTION.INFO: The measure numbering rule (unused)

OPTION.NAME: slurControlPointsr
OPTION.INFO: Slur control points - higher value means more curved at the end

OPTION.NAME: slurCurveFactor
OPTION.INFO: Slur curve factor - high value means rounder slurs

OPTION.NAME: slurHeightFactor
OPTION.INFO: Slur height factor -  high value means flatter slurs

OPTION.NAME: slurMinHeight
OPTION.INFO: The minimum slur height in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: slurMaxHeight
OPTION.INFO: The maximum slur height in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: slurMaxSlope
OPTION.INFO: The maximum slur slope in degrees

OPTION.NAME: slurThickness
OPTION.INFO: The slur thickness in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: spacingLinear
OPTION.INFO: Specify the linear spacing factor

OPTION.NAME: spacingNonLinear
OPTION.INFO: Specify the non-linear spacing factor

OPTION.NAME: spacingStaff
OPTION.INFO: The staff minimal spacing in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: spacingSystem
OPTION.INFO: The system minimal spacing in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: staffLineWidth
OPTION.INFO: The staff line width in unit

OPTION.NAME: stemWidth
OPTION.INFO: The stem width

OPTION.NAME: tieThickness
OPTION.INFO: The tie thickness in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: appXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set the xPath query for selecting <app> child elements. By default the <lem> or the first <rdg> is selected.

OPTION.NAME: choiceXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set the xPath query for selecting <choice> child elements. By default the first child is selected.

OPTION.NAME: mdivXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set the xPath query for selecting the <mdiv> to be rendered; only one <mdiv> can be rendered.

OPTION.NAME: substXPathQuery
OPTION.INFO: Set the xPath query for selecting <subst> child elements.  By default the first child is selected.

OPTION.NAME: defaultBottomMargin
OPTION.INFO: The default bottom margin

OPTION.NAME: defaultLeftMargin
OPTION.INFO: The default left margin

OPTION.NAME: defaultRightMargin
OPTION.INFO: The default right margin

OPTION.NAME: defaultTopMargin
OPTION.INFO: The default top margin

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginAccid
OPTION.INFO: The margin for accid in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The margin for barLine in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginBeatRpt
OPTION.INFO: The margin for beatRpt in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginChord
OPTION.INFO: The margin for chord in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginClef
OPTION.INFO: The margin for clef in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginKeySig
OPTION.INFO: The margin for keySig in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginLeftBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The margin for left barLine in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMensur
OPTION.INFO: The margin for mensur in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMeterSig
OPTION.INFO: The margin for meterSig in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMRest
OPTION.INFO: The margin for mRest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMRpt2
OPTION.INFO: The margin for mRpt2 in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMultiRest
OPTION.INFO: The margin for multiRest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginMultiRpt
OPTION.INFO: The margin for multiRpt in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginNote
OPTION.INFO: The margin for note in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginRest
OPTION.INFO: The margin for rest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: leftMarginRightBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The margin for right barLine in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginAccid
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for accid in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for barLine in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginBeatRpt
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for beatRpt in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginChord
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for chord in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginClef
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for clef in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginKeySig
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for keySig in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginLeftBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for left barLine in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMensur
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for mensur in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMeterSig
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for meterSig in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMRest
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for mRest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMRpt2
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for mRpt2 in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMultiRest
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for multiRest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginMultiRpt
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for multiRpt in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginNote
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for note in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginRest
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for rest in MEI units

OPTION.NAME: rightMarginRightBarLine
OPTION.INFO: The right margin for right barLine in MEI units
